description:
First, the mysterious secret that Onsokumaru alluded to in episode 6 has finally come to light (thanks to a little "persuasion" from the ninjas)! The shocking truth may change everything for Shinobu...  Then, Shinobu`s goal of becoming a full-fledged ninj
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I. O Segredo Do Onsokumaru! / II. Adeus, 2x2=Shinobuden!
Le secret d`Onsokumaru / Adieu Shinobu, apprentie ninja
Onsokumaru no Himitsu no Maki / Saraba Ninin ga Shinobuden no Maki
Onsokumaru`s Secret / Farewell to Ninja Nonsense
音速丸の秘密の巻 / さらばニニンがシノブ伝の巻
